name: Verify 'Our locations' header, total count and sample cards from JSON (index-based loop)

description:
### 🌍 Our locations (index-based)

Validations:
- Section title & subtitle from JSON.
- Total locations count vs JSON.expectedLocationsCount.
- For each entry in JSON.sampleLocations (index-based):
  * Name matches.
  * Address matches.
  * Email behavior:
    - If JSON email == "" -> UI email may be empty.
    - Otherwise: email text matches and href starts with mailto:.
  * 'Get Direction' href matches JSON.mapsUrl.

steps.name: Wait for 'Our locations' section to be visible
Get total count of location cards in slider
Get location card view by index: 1
Get location card view by index: 2
Get location card view by index: 3
